title: maravakavE O manasa
sahitya:
maravakavE O manasA mA rAmuni nimiSamaina



anupallavi



daraNi vamsha tilakuDE daraNija nAyakuDE



caraNam



paramahamsa muni mAnasa pankaja prabhAkaruDE naravaruDE natajanArtti

harabirudAngiduTE

surahita sangrahuDE sUrijanEdita vibhuDE varada venkaTEshvaruDE vAncita

phala dAyakuDE
